text: - I am John O'Reilly.
I'm a senior cloud advisor working

with AWS Proser in
worldwide public sector,
and so I help our customers make sure
they have the right organization in place,

the right training, the right
people, the right roles,
and the right organizational structure
in order to be able to take advantage
of all the things that cloud offers.
I started to hear about AWS some time ago.

I started work for a
startup and came across AWS

as a great way for us to
automate all of our testing.

I'd worked for mainly smaller
organizations in my career,

and I was looking for a place
where I could really grow

and learn what it was
like to work for a company

with this kind of scale
and this kind of size.
AWS has been fantastic

for really focusing on what
we call work life harmony.

So everyone is gonna have a
different pattern or strategy
for what works for them,
and I've managed to find something

fairly easy that works
for me and my family,
lets me pick them up from school
at the end of the day when I need to,

lets me take time to to
volunteer in the classroom
when I need to.

These are valuable,
important parts of our life,
and we have the opportunity to work
and put in our time and energy
at the time that's best for us.
Being your authentic self
is something that's celebrated here.

We all have things that
are special about us
and that we like to do outside of work.

And this is the first
place where I've ever been

where you don't have to
necessarily keep those
two things separate.

You can really be your
authentic self at work.
You can bring that to work,

and that's appreciated and
celebrated by your colleagues.
